manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Happy working, you won't suffer pains Soft seating surfaces lead to pressure points in your lower body, especially for those people spending 8+ hours a day in a seated position.With our seat cushion, it cradles your bottom, reducing pain in your lower back, hips, and sciatic nerve. VERY IMPORTANT: Memory foam is heat responsive and will soften with body heat. It may feel firm initially but will soften once it absorbs heat from your body.

This desk chair cushion can be used in many occasions Working from home, car, outside or studying for long sitting will be more comfortable with WAOAW office chair cushion.Easy to carry, this chair cushions is great choice for outdoor camping.Product Dimensions: 17 x 13 x 2.75 inches (Fits most of chairs or seats around your home, office, and even car.)

Premium Memory foam Cushion Inside for the Butt Pillow Memory foam uses your body heat to adapt and contour to fit your precise shape. This tailbone pain relief cushion takes into account the amount of weight applied and provides support where you need it most. Memory foam is protected with 2 layers covers, to protect it intact and no get dirty for your long-term daily use.

Designed for Ultimate Comfort Ergonomically U-shaped design cushion for office chair provides the best comfort while reducing pressure on the coccyx, tailbone and promoting well-shaped posture.Our orthopedic seat butt cushion promotes proper spinal alignment and a healthy posture.

Helps Relieve Back Pain & Sciatica WAOAW chair pillow cushions has the following benefits: Reduce Pressure on the tailbonePain relief from sitting long hoursCoccyx / Tailbone ReliefHealthy postureComfortable Sitting

Questions you want to know for our pressure relief seat cushion Seat cushion relief pain? Your back, hips, and coccyx will feel uncomforts if long sitting in a same position. WAOAW desk chair cushion provides maximum support and comfort while reducing pressure on the coccyx, tailbone and promotes healthy posture to relief your pain. Weight limit on this cushion? According to the feedback from our customers, there is no problem with this seat cushion for 300 to 400 pounds. Our cushion for office chair did holds its shape and provides the support those heavy heavy weight people need. Who needs this chair pad? Perfect for Office Use, Driving & Traveling. Perfect for office, home, travel, car seat or wheelchair use for long sitting. A amazing gift ? This seat cushion for back pain is especially suitable for people who have very high requirements for the quality of life and comfort of life, which will be a very intimate and practical gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome cushion, very confortable
reviews.reviewText: Probably not great if your chair isn't adjustable, but I love it so much I have one in my home office and at work. Great if you have tailbone issues also. I can't sit in my chairs without it now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only one that fits my car seat
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been rotating around four different cushions for multiple issues that cause extreme pain. SI joints, sacrum, lumbar spine, hips, sit bones. Two are going back. They actually cause pain because of the cupped seat design.Like car seats, cushions that cradle your bottom hit too many pressure points.This is the only one of the four that fit in my CrossTrek. No pressure points. Soft enough. I have two because we have two Subarus. I forgot to take my cushion the other day and was quickly in pain. Now the cushions stay in each car.I must admit that another brand is the one I prefer on my sofa. I don’t know what it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and comfortable cushion
reviews.reviewText: Cushion is well made. Thickness is comfortable and alleviates my sciatica pain. The shape is good but for me it needs to be longer from front to back. I’m 5’ 9”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Works!!! Just ordered a second one.
reviews.reviewText: Excellent: works exactly as described. Note that it works best when you are in a chair that allows you to sit straight, rather than slouching. The shape of the pad promotes sitting upright and straight. While no pad can eliminate pain, this is a significant reduction in sitting on a standard gel pad, pillow or soft chair/couch. I also recommend wearing loose pants/trousers. Tighter fitting clothes tend to press more firmly against the infected/effected area. Easy to clean and the cover can be removed via zipper to be washed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: To stiff and thick; positions you higher than you need in the chair or seat of vehicle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality.
reviews.reviewText: Love this and works get in the van to sit up better. Great gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical as I had purchased another type before. I was not able to sit for a short period while working thought might need to change chairs. This has saved me money as I do not need to buy another chair. I no longer have a sharp pain in the buttocks when sitting, and when not sitting the cushion re inflates back to its shape.

reviews.reviewTitle: Too soft and fabric is warm
reviews.reviewText: The cushion feels soft and the fabric is warm. Not able to provide sufficient support.
